title: [jit] rand_like is not getting fused
body_html:
Test for rand_like is not checking that it is in fact fused https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_jit.py#L609-L631, and profile shows 2 generate_bernoulli kernels both when this test is run as is, and when I remove @torch.jit.script_method decorator (there is a generated kernel for other pointwise ops with decorator).

                    5.16%  5.5040us         2  2.7520us  2.5600us  2.9440us  generate_uniform(curandStateMtgp32*, int, float*, double, double)

My attempts to get rand_like to fuse using torch.jit.trace have also not been successful.

                    5.16%  5.5040us         2  2.7520us  2.5600us  2.9440us  generate_uniform(curandStateMtgp32*, int, float*, double, double)

My attempts to get rand_like to fuse using torch.jit.trace have also not been successful.
body:
Test for rand_like is not checking that it is in fact fused https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_jit.py#L609-L631, and profile shows 2 `generate_bernoulli` kernels both when this test is run as is, and when I remove  @torch.jit.script_method decorator (there is a generated kernel for other pointwise ops with decorator). 
```
                    5.16%  5.5040us         2  2.7520us  2.5600us  2.9440us  generate_uniform(curandStateMtgp32*, int, float*, double, double)
```
My attempts to get rand_like to fuse using `torch.jit.trace` have also not been successful.
